name: AzureCosmosdb
help: Manage Azure Cosmos DB database accounts.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Capabilities
properties.help: Set custom capabilities on the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.name: DefaultConsistencyLevel
properties.help: Default consistency level of the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.name: EnableAutomaticFailover
properties.help: Enables automatic failover of the write region in the rare event that the region is unavailable due to an outage. Automatic failover will result in a new write region for the account and is chosen based on the failover priorities configured for the account.

properties.name: EnableMultipleWriteLocations
properties.help: Enable Multiple Write Locations.

properties.name: EnableVirtualNetwork
properties.help: Enables virtual network on the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.name: IpRangeFilter
properties.help: Firewall support. Specifies the set of IP addresses or IP address ranges in CIDR form to be included as the allowed list of client IPs for a given database account. IP addresses/ranges must be comma-separated and must not contain any spaces.

properties.name: Kind
properties.help: The type of Cosmos DB database account to create.

properties.name: Locations
properties.help: Space-separated locations in 'regionName=failoverPriority' format. E.g eastus=0 westus=1. Failover priority values are 0 for write regions and greater than 0 for read regions. A failover priority value must be unique and less than the total number of regions. Default: single region account in the location of the specified resource group.

properties.name: MaxInterval
properties.help: When used with Bounded Staleness consistency, this value represents the time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 1 - 100.

properties.name: MaxStalenessPrefix
properties.help: When used with Bounded Staleness consistency, this value represents the number of stale requests tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 1 - 2,147,483,647.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: VirtualNetworkRules
properties.help: ACL's for virtual network.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: FailoverPolicies
properties.help: Space-separated failover policies in 'regionName=failoverPriority' format. E.g eastus=0 westus=1.

A failover priority value must be unique and less than the total number of regions. Default: single region account in the location of the specified resource group.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Cosmos DB database account.

properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: DbName
properties.help: Database Name.

properties.name: Key
properties.help: Cosmos DB account key. Must be used in conjunction with cosmosdb account name or url-connection.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Cosmos DB account name. Must be used in conjunction with either name of the resource group or cosmosdb account key.

properties.name: ResourceGroupName
properties.help: Name of the resource group. Must be used in conjunction with cosmosdb account name.

properties.name: UrlConnection
properties.help: Cosmos DB account url connection. Must be used in conjunction with cosmosdb account key.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
